name: Salon at Atlantis
description: Salon at Atlantis is designed around everything your hands, feet, and hair may desire. Expert stylists deliver cuts, styles, and makeovers while signature manicures and pedicures round out the menu. Whether you're in Reno for a classic manicure or a wedding updo, Salon at Atlantis provides a highly tailored experience. Reservations recommended; walk-ins welcome.
shortDescription: Full-service hair, nail, and beauty salon inside the Atlantis Casino Resort Spa Reno.

faqs.question: Do I need a reservation at Salon at Atlantis?
faqs.answer: Reservations are recommended for the best experience, though walk-ins are welcome.

faqs.question: What services does the salon offer?
faqs.answer: Hair cuts, styling, color, makeovers, manicures, and pedicures — a full-service beauty experience.

testimonials.quote: Got a blowout before our final dinner and it was perfect. The stylists at Salon at Atlantis really know what they're doing.
testimonials.author: Rachel S.

testimonials.quote: Added a manicure to our golf package through GTHS. Easy to book and the salon was excellent — fresh nails for the course!
testimonials.author: Amy C.

meta.title: Salon at Atlantis Reno – Hair, Nails & Beauty | Golf The High Sierra
